Articles.Content:
I found KSP a few weeks ago and I dove in head first. Now I'm up to my eyes in parts from 4 or 5 add-ons. I've tried making custom parts selections in game, but it's clunky and takes forever. I've looked for a parts sorter add-on but the two I've found are not up to date for 0.90.

Where can I find the categories folder in the KSP folder? I found the sub-assemblies folder in the saves folder, but I haven't had any luck finding anything even remotely close to a categories folder, or even a file.

Edited January 1, 2015 by twiget

Never mind, I found what I was looking for. It took a little more digging but I found it here: "Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\PartList\PartCategories.cgf".

Would have found it on the first try if I had been able to spell "categories" correctly in the search bar.
